version_description:
1.0.12
- Fixed a broken link to our Discord server
- Updated descriptions for character attributes

1.0.11
- Updated an app store image

1.0.10
- Fixed an issue which caused autosave to sometimes trigger too early
- The slot and timestamp of the save used in “Try again” is now visible
- Minor typo fixes

1.0.10
- Fixed an issue which caused autosave to sometimes trigger too early
- The slot and timestamp of the save used in “Try again” is now visible
- Minor typo fixes

1.1.0
- Resilience will now increase the chance to block when using a shield
- Increased the health bonus from Resilience
- Increased damage of ranged weapons
- Increased bonus from Perception to ranged weapon damage
- Added ability to re-center the map
- Fixed a bug which caused a previous narrative to overlap the new one in certain situations

1.0.13
- Updated the load/save screen UIs
- Added option in paywall to load from most recent save

1.1.1 
- Block chance is now displayed on the character sheet
- Fixed a dead end in a dialogue which could occur when certain criteria was met
- Added social links to main menu
- The game now ignore iOS font scaling due to lack of support
- Added demo disclaimer when starting the game fresh without having purchased

1.0.13
- Updated the load/save screen UIs
- Added option in paywall to load from most recent save

v1.1.2
- Added support for review/rate prompt after having finished the game
- Updated formatting of all scriptures
- Fixed a bug with purchase restoration
- Increased damage when unarmed
- Fixed an issue which caused the UI to break when the player’s gold was over a certain limit
- Added a fallback for players who didn’t pick up the knife on the beach
- Minor bug fixes

1.1.0
- Resilience will now increase the chance to block when using a shield
- Increased the health bonus from Resilience
- Increased damage of ranged weapons
- Increased bonus from Perception to ranged weapon damage
- Added ability to re-center the map
- Fixed a bug which caused a previous narrative to overlap the new one in certain situations

v1.1.3
- Options which previously led to the player being harmed but weren’t lethal are now a bit more dangerous.
- Fixed a bug which caused the player to stay alive in certain situations after a fight even when having been killed by the opponent
- Fixed a minor bug which caused health to be higher than maximum health when un-equipping items which increased maximum health, when at full health
- Closed an unintended gap in the story which could occur when dealing with the thugs on Roe Island
- Misc minor fixes such as typos, text updates and UI copy changes
